name: Grinny Gremlin
description: Grinny Gremlin is the mischievous leader of the Giggly Gremlins, known for their adorable antics. With a perpetual grin and twinkling eyes, Grinny is always ready for fun.

name: Chuckles Chomper
description: Chuckles Chomper is a cuddly but toothy Gremlin who loves to nibble on snacks and tell silly jokes. Collect Chuckles and hear giggles all day long!

name: Giddy Gizmo
description: Giddy Gizmo is a tech-savvy Gremlin, always tinkering with gadgets and gizmos. This vinyl toy is perfect for little inventors and aspiring scientists.

name: Wobble Whimsy
description: Wobble Whimsy is the most unpredictable Gremlin in the bunch, always wobbling and tumbling with laughter. This vinyl toy is a barrel of laughs.

name: Melody Mia
description: Melody Mia is the music-loving vinyl toy girl with her headphones always on, ready to groove to the beats and share her passion for tunes with everyone.

name: Harmony Harper
description: Harmony Harper is a vinyl toy sensation with her harmonious voice and love for singing. She's the perfect companion for those who appreciate the beauty of music.

name: DJ Daisy
description: DJ Daisy is the vinyl toy girl who's a master at mixing and spinning tunes. With her cool headphones and turntable, she's ready to get the party started.

name: Rhythmic Rosie
description: Rhythmic Rosie is a vinyl toy girl with a knack for creating catchy rhythms. Her drumsticks are always at the ready for an impromptu jam session.

name: Mystic Munchkin
description: Mystic Munchkin is a plump and adorable little monster who resides in a hidden cave. It loves to snack on colorful mushrooms and tell stories to all who visit.

name: Dreamy Dragonling
description: Dreamy Dragonling is a tiny dragon with pastel-colored scales, known for bringing sweet dreams to children and collecting shiny trinkets.

name: Sparkle Sprite
description: Sparkle Sprite is a tiny, shimmering creature from a magical forest, known for spreading joy with its sparkling dust and enchanting presence.

name: Giggly Gargoyle
description: Giggly Gargoyle is a playful guardian of ancient castles, with a love for pranks and riddles. Collect this vinyl toy for a touch of whimsy and protection.
